results.title: Undead
results.creator_credit: Michael Spierig, Peter Spierig, Imagine Entertainment (US) and Spierigfilm
results.brief_description: Australian twin filmmaking brothers, Michael and Peter Spierig, have written, produced and directed this, their first feature film. They have achieved their goal of creating a schlock splatter horror with a load of laughs but with a sci-fi alien plot twist that makes it stands out. What also stands out is the finish of the film as its low budget is not that evident in the final outcome. Fictional small Australian country town of Berkeley, renowned for its good fishing, is invaded by aliens that send strange meteors from space turning people into the undead - zombies. The local beauty contest winner Rene (Felicity Mason) is about to leave town but is prevented when her driver becomes victim to zombie attack. The local town loony, a tall silent bloke called Marion (Mungo McKay), comes to her aid with a three-barrelled custom-made rifle. Blood, gore, splatter and laughs aplenty ensue as our hapless heroes (including the swearing town cop and his rookie constable, Wayne and his pregnant girlfriend) go about surviving the onslaught of brain sucking zombies. The aliens appear on earth cleansing some folks with healing rain and they are then ascended to orbit the earth. The ending has the potential for a sequel and hopefully someone will give them the money! This is must see cult classic for those into the schlock/horror or low budget independent genre/s. Crew that deserve special mention are the make-up designer Steven Boyle, cinematographer Andrew Strahorn, composer Cliff Bradley and everyone that worked on the special effects, which includes the directors. (“The Making Of” in the extras is worth a look if you’re thinking of making a low budget feature!) Hopefully there will be more from The Spierig Brothers in the future. SOME SCENES MAY DISTURB.

results.title: 21 grams = Twenty one grams
results.creator_credit: Alejandro Gonzalez Inarritu, Robert Salerno, Focus Features, This Is That and Y Production
results.brief_description: Following a tragic accident, three people’s lives are connected in a way that is emotionally intense and devastating. Christine (Naomi Watts) is a wife and mother of two girls. Paul (Sean Penn) is a mathematician with a congenital heart problem and a troubled relationship. Jack (Benicio Del Toro) is an ex-con, born-again Christian and father of two children. This revenge-style drama could be told in a straight forward way but the writer Guillermo Arriaga and director Alejandro Gonzalez Inarritu have chosen a non-linear approach with the story told by glimpses forward and back until becoming clear to the viewer just how these people’s lives do connect. The three leads are convincing in their performances with Watts and Del Toro being nominated for Academy Awards and Sean Penn for a BAFTA.

results.title: Mystic river
results.creator_credit: Clint Eastwood, Judie G. Hoyt, Robert Lorenz and Malpaso Company
results.brief_description: An intense drama from director Clint Eastwood, about three childhood friends whose paths meet in adult life when one of their teenage children is murdered. Sean Penn (Jimmy) plays the anguished father of the murdered girl (winning an Academy Award for Best Actor for his performance), with Kevin Bacon (Sean) as the police detective investigating, and Tim Robbins as the troubled suspect Dave (also an Academy Award winning performance). Based on the novel by Dennis Lehane. Cast also includes Marcia Gay Harden, Laurence Fishburne and Laura Linney.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Clint Eastwood, Judie G. Hoyt, Robert Lorenz and Malpaso Company

results.title: Time out = L'Emploi du temps
results.creator_credit: Laurent Cantet, Caroline Benjo, Arte France, Haut et Court, Havas Images and Rhone-Alpes Cinema
results.brief_description: Vincent, (Aurelien Recoing) who has been gainfully employed in a middle-management role for eleven years, suddenly finds himself fired. Not able to tell his wife or family he drifts and thinks up ways to get money to maintain the facade that he is heading off to work at an exciting new job in Switzerland. The emotion and tension builds slowly over the time he maintains this charade, with the film’s dramatically restrained direction and performances getting across the internal struggle he faces daily and the growing suspicions of his family. “Time Out” is not just a personal, internal drama but also a commentary on the role of work in contemporary society and its effect on middle-class family life. Written and directed by Laurent Cantet, “Time Out” is also winner of best film awards in Venice and Montreal. Cast includes Karin Viard, Serge Livrozet.

results.title: Targets
results.creator_credit: Peter Bogdanovich, Paramount Pictures and Saticoy
results.brief_description: The first feature of Peter Bogdanovich combines two seemingly unrelated plots. Plot one follows the depressed retiring horror film actor (Boris Karloff) and his despairing of the real horror of 60’s America. Meanwhile a lone sniper picks off strangers after coldly killing his parents and a delivery boy. The disquieting plots meet after tenion builds at a drive-in cinema. A tense and disturbing film. Cast also include Tim O’Kelly, Nancy Hsueh and James Brown.

results.title: The Day of the locust
results.creator_credit: John Schlesinger, Jerome Hellman, Long Road Productions and Paramount Pictures
results.brief_description: A scathing take on 1930s Hollywood motion picture industry, this film was only a moderate success at the time of release, despite garnering two Academy Award nominations. Adapted from Nathanael West’s novel the film principally charts the ambitions of Faye Greener (Karen Black), a talent-less starlet dreaming of fame, well beyond her grasp. In Faye’s orbit are Tod Hackett, a budding production designer and Homer Simpson, a wealthy suitor. Both men are driven mad by Faye’s excessive flirtations, yet stubborn unavailability. The narrative builds to a shocking climax. Music composed and conducted by John Barry.

results.title: Sweet talker
results.creator_credit: Michael Jenkins, Ben Gannon, New Town Films and New Vision Films
results.brief_description: Con artist Harry Reynolds is released from prison armed with his partners research for a new scam. Harry heads for the dying town of Beachport near the coast of Australia where he cons the locals into investing big bucks into his scam (the recovery of an old ship and the building of a theme park). Complications arise when Harry falls for the local hotel owner Julie and her young son David. Cast includes: Bryan Brown, Karen Allen, Chris Haywood, Bill Kerr, Bruce Spence, Bruce Myles.

results.title: The Sum of all fears
results.creator_credit: Phil Alden Robinson, Mace Neufeld, AZL Productions KG, MFP Munich Film Partners GmbH and Paramount Pictures
results.brief_description: Based on the best-selling novel by Tom Clancy with screenplay by Paul Attanasia and Daniel Pyne, this political thriller revives the tensions and paranoia of the Cold War era between the Americans and the Russians when the CIA suspect that Russia is once again involved in the development of nuclear weapons. Suspense and intrigue follow as a terrorist plot brings the two super-powers to the brink of nuclear war. Starring Ben Affleck as the rather young CIA agent Jack Ryan and Morgan Freeman as CIA Director William Cabot with James Cromwell, Liev Schreiber, Bridget Moynahan, Alan Bates.

results.title: Fallen
results.creator_credit: Gregory Hoblit, Charles Rover, Dawn Steel, Atlas Entertainment and Turner Pictures
results.brief_description: High budget supernatural thriller that sees Joe Hobbs (Denzel Washington) witness the execution of a serial killer. Things take a menacing turn when identical murders take place. It appears that a demon is passing through humans possessing them thus enabling the killer to continue with his murdering. Taunting the detective a twist at the end keeps the drama gripping. Police drama meets supernatural thriller. Cast includes John Goodman, Donald Sutherland and James Gandolfini.

results.title: The Blair Witch Project
results.creator_credit: Daniel Myrick, Eduardo Sanchez, Greg Hale, Robin Cowie and Haxan Films
results.brief_description: Presented as a documentary “The Blair Witch Project” tells of a group of students lost in the woods in search of the world of witchcraft. The story is told using the found documentary footage of the group recovered from the forest. Successfully creepy this low budget feature with jerky camerawork is understatedly disturbing.
